room_title: Escape room "Project MK-ULTRA" by Escape Game Knoxville in Knoxville
review: We almost made it -- it was just my daughter (11) and I, and we think if we had 1 or 2 more people, we would have made it with time to spare. We did the MK-Ultra room and figured out a bunch of clues together and had a blast. The staff on site was great -- friendly and helpful. Definitely going back soon to try another escape room!

room_title: Escape room "Project MK-ULTRA" by Escape Game Knoxville in Knoxville
review: Fellow interns and our field instructor tried to escape MK-Ultra this past week. We were sooo close! Had a blast!! Look forward to trying again!!

room_title: Escape room "Project MK-ULTRA" by Escape Game Knoxville in Knoxville
review: After living in Knoxville for 9 years and complaining about the lack of things to do that aren't "go to a bar," Escape Game Knoxville was a breath of fresh air. Inventive, innovative, and intellectually challenging riddles and clues that aren't overly frustrating, but provide enough of a challenge that keep you involved and captivated. A job well done to the entire team. I'll be back very soon!
